price: Kuma waɗanda suka yi hijira a cikin tafarkin Allah sa'an nan kuma aka kashe su, kõ suka mutu, lalle ne Allah Yanã azurta su da arziki mai kyau. Kuma lalle ne Allah, haƙĩƙa, Shĩ ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu azurtãwa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ قُتِلُوٓاْ أَوۡ مَاتُواْ لَيَرۡزُقَنَّهُمُ ٱللَّهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hājarū fī sabīli al-lahi thumma qutilū aw mātū layarzuqannahumu al-lahu riz'qan ḥasanan wa-inna al-laha lahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
